sentences.sContent: This might be compared with the jumble of wavelengths of sound that go to make up ordinary noise.
sentences.sContent_eng: This might be compared with the jumble of wavelengths of sound that go to make up ordinary noise.
sentences.sCn: 这种现象可以与合在一起构成普通噪音的声波波长的混杂情况相比。

sentences.sContent: Reminiscent of experimental film or abstract expressionist paintings, the software creates an animated jumble of bright and energetic abstract light compositions.
sentences.sContent_eng: Reminiscent of experimental film or abstract expressionist paintings, the software creates an animated jumble of bright and energetic abstract light compositions.
sentences.sCn: 实验电影或抽象表现主义绘画让人回想起该软件创建了一个明亮的光线和有力的抽象作品动画混杂。

remMethod.val: jum(看作jump， 跳) + ble → 上蹿下跳， 群魔乱舞 → 混杂

words.tran: 轮状的薄糖果；薄脆小甜饼（等于jumble）

trans.tranOther: a lot of different things mixed together in an untidy way, without any order
